Why does LoL not had built in Voip,  Counterstrike, Call of Duty, BattleField, mechwarrior online etc all have built in voip and are less toxic communities.

Being able to communicate instantly instead of  typing when your supposed to be focusing on what your meant to be doing in the game would lower peoples anger and frustration that builds from inefficient communication methods in a fast paced game.

Being able to hear someones Voice rather than text of a random champion on a screen adds a more human element to interactions, which lowers toxicity by making the interaction more humane less robotic.

Your pro's use Voip in tournaments, would like to see them only allowed to use text to communicate !

You can simply mute toxic trolls removing the issue of having to listen to people you dont want to.

You removed the Curse Voip mod/ banned it  from working inside your game,  why ?

Add Voip to your game 3 years ago please riot,  thankyou.

If  not  please explain the logic behind not adding voip,  to me it makes 0 sense.

In my perspective, I can see that the Super Galaxy skins are really similar to the idea of power ranger with the colour scheme and their pyjama suits. Rumble is red ranger, kindred is yellow ranger, Shyvana is pink ranger, and fizz the blue ranger. This means that there should be a green or black ranger. If the current super galaxy team are meant to fit into their own roles on the map respectively, then the last ranger (if rumble is to stay as the current red ranger) could be a support role champion, like karma (green ranger) or alistar (black ranger) with animal components in their design. Karma could have snakes and alistar a bull. I have also noticed that all the current super galaxy skins are also junglers, so in this case the black ranger could be evelynn (seeing she hasn't received a skin in such a long time) or elise. I think that both of those could also fit into the Prgram skins thematic as well.
